name: Hairy Face Salon 2: Monster Shave Makeover
name_original: Hairy Face Salon 2: Monster Shave Makeover
description:
Hairy Face Salon 2: Monster Shave Makeover is an arcade game developed by TabTale. It came out on 13-04-2014. TabTale published the game.
You can play Hairy Face Salon 2: Monster Shave Makeover on iOS and Android.
